RmBayesSonarModel.cpp

00001 #include <assert.h>
00002 #include "RmBayesSonarModel.h"
00003 #include "RmExceptions.h"
00004 
00005 /*
00006  * Region I (Eqs 11.1, 11.4, 11.6):
00007  * - prSnGivOcc = ( ((R - r) / R) + ((BETA - alpha) / BETA) ) / 2 * maxOccupied;
00008  * - priorPrOccGivSn = m_prGrid[gridCoord.x][gridCoord.y]
00009  * - prSnGivEmp = 1 - prSnGivOcc
00010  * - priorPrEmpGivSn = 1 - priorPrOccGivSn
00011  * 
00012  * Region II (Eqs 11.2, 11.4, 11.6):
00013  * - prSnGivOcc = ( 1 - [( ((R - r) / R) + ((BETA - alpha) / BETA) ) / 2] ) * maxEmpty
00014  * - priorPrOccGivSn = m_prGrid[gridCoord.x][gridCoord.y]
00015  * - prSnGivEmp = 1 - prSnGivOcc
00016  * - priorPrEmpGivSn = 1 - priorPrOccGivSn
00017  * 
00018  * Where:
00019  * - prSnGivOcc = P(Occupied) in Eq 11.1/2, P(s|H) in Eq 11.3, and P(s|Occupied) in Eq 11.4
00020  * - priorPrOccGivSn = P(H) in Eq 11.3, P(Occupied) in Eq 11.4, and P(H|s_{n-1}) in Eq 11.6
00021  * - prSnGivEmp = P(Empty) in Eq 11.1/2, P(s|~H) in Eq 11.3, and P(s|Empty) in Eq 11.4
00022  * - priorPrEmpGivSn = P(~H) in Eq 11.3, P(Empty) in Eq 11.4, and P(~H|s_{n=1}) in Eq 11.6
00023  * - maxOccupied = 0.98
00024  * - maxEmpty = 0.50 (or 1.0, historically)
00025  * - resulting cell value = 
00026  *   prSnGivOcc * priorPrOccGivSn / ( prSnGivOcc * priorPrOccGivSn + prSnGivEmp * priorPrEmpGivSn )
00027  */
00028 
00029 
00030 float RmBayesSonarModel::prOccupiedGivenSn( 
00031         float priorPrOccGivSn, Region region, double r, double alpha ) const
00032 {
00033         char buff[30];
00034         if ( region != RegionI && region != RegionII ) {
00035                 sprintf( buff, "Region specification must be %d or %d; is %d", RegionI, RegionII, region );
00036                 throw RmExceptions::InvalidParameterException( 
00037                         "RmBayesSonarModel::prOccupiedGivenSn()", buff );
00038         }
00039         if ( r < 0 || r > R ) {
00040                 assert( false );
00041                 sprintf( buff, "Range reading of %.0f is outside bounds of [0..%.0f]", r, R ); 
00042                 throw RmExceptions::InvalidParameterException( 
00043                         "RmBayesSonarModel::prOccupiedGivenSn()", buff );
00044         }
00045         if ( alpha < 0 || alpha > m_settings->Beta ) {
00046                 sprintf( buff, "Alpha of %.2f is outside bounds of [0..%.2f]", alpha, m_settings->Beta );
00047                 throw RmExceptions::InvalidParameterException( 
00048                         "RmBayesSonarModel::prOccupiedGivenSn()", buff );
00049         }
00050 
00051         // It is possible that a cell will have obtained a probability of occupancy of 1.0
00052         // and that the cell will later be on the outer boundary of Region I, such that
00053         // alpha = BETA and r = R.  In this event, the below formula will become
00054         //      0.0 * 1.0 / ((0.0 * 1.0) + (1.0 * 0.0)) = 0 / 0 = Undefined
00055         // In this event, it doesn't seem reasonable that the probability should fall from
00056         // 1.0 to 0.0 in one iteration.  Therefore bring in r a bit, which actually leaves
00057         // the resulting pr unchanged, at 1.0, for this example.
00058         if ( r == R && alpha == m_settings->Beta ) r -= 0.0001f;
00059 
00060         float prSnGivOcc = prSnGivenOccupied( r, alpha, region ); // P(s_n|H)
00061         float prSnGivEmp = 1 - prSnGivOcc; // P(s_n|~H)
00062         float priorPrEmpGivSn = 1 - priorPrOccGivSn; // P(~H|s_{n-1})
00063         
00064         float pr = (prSnGivOcc * priorPrOccGivSn) / 
00065                 ((prSnGivOcc * priorPrOccGivSn) + (prSnGivEmp * priorPrEmpGivSn));
00066 
00067         return pr;
00068 }
00069 
00070 
00071 float RmBayesSonarModel::prSnGivenOccupied( double r, double alpha, Region region ) const
00072 {
00073         // P(s_n|H) for
00074         //              Region I = [(R - r) / R + (Beta - alpha) / Beta] / 2 * Max_{occupied}
00075         //              Region II = 1 - P(s_n|~H)
00076 
00077         // NOTE: this formula doesn't account for the cell's distance from the sonar reading,
00078         // so that probabilities increase as r approaches 0, regardless of how far from the
00079         // sonar the cell is.  This doesn't agree with the pictured sonar model,
00080         // where the range reading is shown at the peak of a 3-d gaussian hill over Region I.
00081 
00082         if ( r < 0 || r > R ) 
00083                 throw RmExceptions::InvalidParameterException( "prSnGivenOccupied( r )" );
00084         if ( alpha < 0 || alpha > m_settings->Beta ) 
00085                 throw RmExceptions::InvalidParameterException( "prSnGivenOccupied( alpha )" );
00086         if ( region != RegionI && region != RegionII ) 
00087                 throw RmExceptions::InvalidParameterException( "prSnGivenOccupied( region )" );
00088 
00089         float pr;
00090 
00091         switch ( region )
00092         {
00093                 case RegionI:
00094                         // In the original equation, alpha is not multiplied by any factor
00095                         // Doing so here will often produce a negative result, so need to adjust for it
00096                         pr = ( ((R - r) / R) + 
00097                                 ((m_settings->Beta - (alpha * m_settings->AlphaFactor)) / m_settings->Beta) ) / 2 
00098                                 * m_settings->MaxOccupied;
00099                         if ( pr <= 0 ) pr = 0.0001f;
00100                         break;
00101 
00102                 case RegionII:
00103                         pr = ( 1 - prSnGivenEmpty( r, alpha, region ) ) * m_settings->MaxEmpty;
00104                         break;
00105         }
00106 
00107         return pr;
00108 }
00109 
00110 
00111 float RmBayesSonarModel::prSnGivenEmpty( double r, double alpha, Region region ) const
00112 {
00113         // P(s_n|~H) for 
00114         //   Region I = 1 - P(s_n|H)
00115         //   Region II = [(R - r) / R + (Beta - alpha) / Beta] / 2
00116 
00117         if ( r < 0 || r > R ) 
00118                 throw RmExceptions::InvalidParameterException( "prSnGivenEmpty( r )" );
00119         if ( alpha < 0 || alpha > m_settings->Beta ) 
00120                 throw RmExceptions::InvalidParameterException( "prSnGivenEmpty( alpha )" );
00121         if ( region != RegionI && region != RegionII )
00122                 throw RmExceptions::InvalidParameterException( "prSnGivenEmpty( region )" );
00123 
00124         float pr;
00125 
00126         switch ( region )
00127         {
00128                 case RegionI:
00129                         pr = 1 - prSnGivenOccupied( r, alpha, region );
00130                         break;
00131 
00132                 case RegionII:
00133                         // In the original equation, alpha is not multiplied by any factor
00134                         // Doing so here will often result in a negative result, so need to adjust for it
00135                         pr = ( ((R - r) / R) + 
00136                                 ((m_settings->Beta - (alpha * m_settings->AlphaFactor)) / m_settings->Beta) ) / 2;
00137                         if ( pr <= 0 ) pr = 0.0001f;                            
00138                         break;
00139         }
00140 
00141         return pr;
00142 }
